name: Bird Fly (DonQuixote)
description:
Just a small project to learn how to upload Unity projects to Itch.IO.

Keep in mind this is in no way supposed to be a finished project. I may come and update it from time to time. Comment your highscore if you play!

HOW TO PLAY:

Press the spacebar or the left mouse button to jump! Go in between as many obstacles as you can to get a highscore! But be careful, if you get pushed off screen, it's game over!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music by Bart: https://opengameart.org/users/bart

Art assets by Pixel Frog: https://itch.io/profile/pixelfrog-assets

Background by MadFireOn: https://itch.io/profile/swapnilrane24
